column4: hello all. I'm new to irc (first time, I've never been able to get connected before), and relatively new to Ubuntu. My tech-support son is at college and unavailable and I'm far to embarrassed to tell him I've been messing with my system anyway :/  Problem is my cd/dvd drive. Something isn't working and I receive a message at boot that says      mount: mounting none on /dev failed..... I've spent the last two days in the support docs look
the last part of your post got chopped.. what exactly isn't working with the cd/dvd rom?  Can't play a commercial movie?
and that was it? .. nothing there to suggest that it's the cd/dvd rom .. was there more to it?
what program are you trying to use to do that?
arg.. no experience with that program.. but are you basically telling it to burn "data" and then tagging files or directories?
right.
might be gnomebaker, might be a bad disk.. personally I"d install k3b .. it's pretty much the defacto standard for burning cd's/dvd's .. and the interface is "nicer"
k3b?

yes.. it's actually a kde program but runs fine on gnome (providing you know the difference :)  ).. the software center should have it listed or Synaptic package manager or from terminal you can type ... sudo apt-get install k3b
use a persons "nick" when responding and your responses won't get lost in the noise.... there are over 1000 people here
I'm getting that. Thanks
Hey... I'm over 50 and I can do this stuff too!  :)  <---- smiley face
yes, I am trying to burn, but I tried playing a dvd to check the drive
and the dvd wouldn't play.....and got stuck in the device for the rest of the day.
if it's a commercial dvd you need the right "codecs" to decode it..
it was commercial and I have all the updated restricted's.
(I duck fast, don't I)
but are they from the medibuntu repositories?  that's the only place to get the libdvdcss(version number)..
yep, from the mediabuntu reps. just checked them tonight (using the terminal I might add. I was very proud of myself)
Once you catch on this stuff will be easier... and an adventure. I've gotta go so I'll let lulu7 finish up.. good luck.
I know and thanks
hey, you came back. Missed the chaos?
